Title: Transfer Operations
Description: Learn how to transfer items between locations.

Topics.Title: Transferring Inventory
Topics.Summary: Move items from one location to another.
Topics.Content:
Transfer Operations

The Transfer tab allows you to move inventory items from one location to another without changing the quantity.

How to Transfer

  1. Navigate to the Transfer tab (Ctrl+3).
  2. Enter search criteria (Part, Operation) to find the items you want to transfer.
  3. Click Search (Ctrl+S) to display matching inventory.
  4. Select the items you want to transfer from the grid.
  5. Enter the Destination Location in the 'To Location' field.
  6. Click Transfer (Ctrl+T) to complete the operation.

Right Panel

Use the Right Panel (toggle with Ctrl+Left/Right Arrow) to see detailed information about selected items before transferring.

Reset

Press Ctrl+R to clear all fields and start a new search.

Topics.Title: Transfer Validation
Topics.Content:
Transfer Validation

The system validates transfers to ensure data integrity.

  • Location Validation: Both source and destination locations must exist in the system.
  • Quantity Check: Cannot transfer more than the available quantity at the source location.
  • Part Validation: Part number must be valid and active in Infor Visual.

If validation fails, the system will display an error message explaining the issue.
